:root{--space-xxs:0.25rem;--space-xs:0.5rem;--space-sm:1rem;--space-md:1.5rem;--space-lg:2rem;--space-xl:3rem;--space-xxl:6rem;--c-white:#fff;--c-dark:#0e080c;--c-dark-1:#2a2a2a;--c-dark-2:#4e4e4e;--c-dark-3:#434343;--c-dark-4:#4b4b4b;--c-light-1:#f0f0f0;--c-light-2:#d2dae2;--min-content-size:25rem;--max-content-size:50rem;--item-size:18.75rem;--item-size-negative:-18.75rem}*,:after,:before{box-sizing:border-box;margin:0;padding:0}html{block-size:100%}body{min-block-size:100%;font-family:Source Sans Pro,system-ui,sans-serif;overscroll-behavior:none;overflow:hidden}.main{display:grid;grid-template-columns:[side-start] minmax(40rem,var(--max-content-size)) [side-end content-start] minmax(min-content,1fr) [content-end end-space-start] 1.875rem [end-space-end];gap:var(--space-md);position:relative}nav{position:absolute;top:50%;left:11.875rem;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);z-index:1000}nav ul{list-style:none}nav li{visibility:hidden;opacity:0;position:absolute}nav li a{--link-opacity:0.3;text-decoration:none;color:var(--c-dark);font-weight:600;opacity:var(--link-opacity);cursor:pointer;transition:all .4s ease}nav li.active>a{--link-opacity:1}.scroll-menu{visibility:hidden;opacity:0;position:absolute;top:50%;left:-1.2rem;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);inline-size:45rem;block-size:45rem;background-image:linear-gradient(var(--c-light-2),var(--c-light-1));border-radius:50%;overflow:hidden;z-index:1000}.scroll-menu .scrollbar{position:absolute;content:"";top:15.625rem;left:9.375rem;inline-size:9.375rem;block-size:43.75rem;background:var(--c-dark);transform-origin:center top;transform:rotate(225deg)}.scroll-menu .overlay{position:absolute;inset:var(--space-xxs);border-radius:50%;background:var(--c-white)}.scroll-menu .circle-1{position:absolute;inset:15rem;border-radius:50%;z-index:2001;background:linear-gradient(90deg,var(--c-dark-2),var(--c-dark-1))}.scroll-menu .circle-2{position:absolute;inset:11.875rem;border-radius:50%;z-index:2000;background:linear-gradient(90deg,var(--c-dark-3),var(--c-dark-4))}.scroll-menu .circle-2-overlay{position:absolute;inset:12.813rem;border-radius:50%;z-index:2000;background:var(--c-white)}.content{grid-column:content-start/content-end;height:100vh}.scroll-content{visibility:hidden;opacity:0;display:grid!important;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit,minmax(18.75rem,var(--min-content-size)))}.scroll-content.even .item:nth-last-of-type(2n) .heading,.scroll-content.odd .item:nth-last-of-type(odd) .heading{border-left:1px solid var(--c-light-2)}.scroll-content.even .item:nth-last-of-type(odd) .heading,.scroll-content.odd .item:nth-last-of-type(2n) .heading{border-right:1px solid var(--c-light-2)}.scroll-content.even .item:nth-last-of-type(2n){transform:translateY(var(--item-size-negative))}@media only screen and (max-width:104.8125em){.scroll-content.even .item:nth-last-of-type(2n){transform:none}.scroll-content.even .item:nth-last-of-type(2n) .heading{border-right:1px solid var(--c-light-2)}}@media only screen and (max-width:104.8125em){.scroll-content.even .item:nth-last-of-type(odd){transform:none}.scroll-content.even .item:nth-last-of-type(odd) .heading{border-left:1px solid var(--c-light-2)}}.scroll-content.odd .item:nth-last-of-type(odd){transform:translateY(var(--item-size-negative))}@media only screen and (max-width:104.8125em){.scroll-content.odd .item:nth-last-of-type(odd){transform:none}}.side{grid-column:side-start/side-end;display:flex;flex-direction:column}.side h1{justify-self:end;font-size:var(--space-xxl);margin-block-start:20%}.side .text,.side h1{visibility:hidden;opacity:0;transform:translateY(-15px);align-self:flex-end;margin-inline-end:var(--space-xxl)}.side .text{inline-size:13.125rem;position:relative}.side .text .line{block-size:4px;inline-size:38px;background:var(--c-dark);position:absolute;left:-18px;top:8px}.side .text p{line-height:1.6;font-size:13px;inline-size:75%;position:absolute;color:var(--c-dark);right:0}.side .author{visibility:hidden;opacity:0;align-self:flex-end;margin-block-start:auto;margin-block-end:10%;color:var(--c-dark);margin-inline-end:22%;font-weight:400;font-size:15px}.item{display:grid;block-size:600px}.item:first-child .picture{border-left:1px solid var(--c-light-2);background:transparent}@media only screen and (max-width:104.8125em){.item:first-child{display:none}}.item:nth-child(2) .heading{border-left:1px solid .order{flex:1;display:flex;align-items:flex-end;justify-content:flex-end;font-size:var(--space-xxl);margin-inline-end:15px}.item .picture{block-size:300px}.item .picture img{inline-size:100%;block-size:100%;display:block;object-fit:cover}
